header.title: Programs
header.subtitle: MiCasita offers many methods of enrollment for your children.

toddler_community.title: Toddler Community
toddler_community.description: Full Day Montessori immersion progam for your toddler.

childrens_house.title: Children's House
childrens_house.description: Children can enter this program as early as 2 years 9 months, if they are fully toilet trained and developmentally ready.

family_services.title: Family Services
family_services.description: Ranging from buenas dias to summer exploration, look at what more Mi Casita can offer.
